divs: Sighting Detailscouple of nights ago saw a flash as i was driving home and looked to where itcame from and there where blinking kindof lights. got the cam corder and gotsome footage. Then tonight saw that same kind of flash. looked to where itcame from and the same thing was there only closer. it is just above the eastmountain area. i feel scared a little to go and take more footage because thereseems to be more than one in the sky. but i feel a need to know, so as soon asmy camere has more juice i will get more footage. im very serious about mysighting. this has never happened before nor have i ever really been abeliever. this is almost changing my mind
Summary: green and red mainly. flashing lights
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around March 27th 2001
